name: Web of Wyrd
description:
Visual adventure game based on the mystical Yggdrasil and the three norn sisters spinning the web of human destinies.

Entry for Global GameJam 2023: https://globalgamejam.org/2023/games/web-wyrd-6

Mareike Rescheleit - Art Director, 2D Environment and Character Artist

Hjalte Tagmose - Programmer

Agnes Neier - Writer, Narritve Designer

Tristan de l’Arkadien - 2D Prop and Character Artist
